preconditions.precondition: User clicks on login into Adgangsplatformen

mainSequence.step: DPL_CMS gets authorization URL and return URL from OpenidConnect
OpenidConnect tells the browser to redirect to the authorization URL
User redirects to external site using the full authorization URL
User is redirected to the return URL
User sends Adgangsplatform response to DPL_CMS
DPL_CMS validates values from the Adgangsplatform response
OpenidConnect requests access token from Adgangsplatformen
Adgangsplatformen returns access token with expire timestamp to OpenidConnect
OpenidConnect requests user info from Adgangsplatformen
Adgangsplatformen returns user info (UUID) to OpenidConnect
OpenidConnect creates user in DPL_CMS (First time login scenario)
OpenidConnect updates user in DPL_CMS (Recurrent login scenario)
OpenidConnect begins Drupal user session in DPL_CMS
OpenidConnect saves access token in active user session in DPL_CMS
User is redirected to the frontpage after successful login
